summary: A test suite that validates a wide range of model-related functionality, including Unicode handling, foreign‑key chains, date filtering and lookups, empty choice fields, navigation helpers, long text fields, model initialization constraints, primary‑key/foreign‑key type compatibility, related field range queries, SQL insert behavior, and timezone handling.
business_intent: Provide automated verification of the data model layer to prevent regressions and ensure correct ORM behavior across diverse scenarios.
